Title: S7 Ep. 290 Matthew Hogan: Learn, Engage, and Be Mindful of the Future we Create
Description:
I met Matthew Hogan at the 2023 IITSEC annual conference.  He is the founder and CEO of M3D Technologies.  He is a service-disabled #Navy veteran who studied Studio Production and Visual Effects at Full Sail University and The DAVE School in Orlando. Matthew founded and operated several small businesses after leaving the Naval service, and has successfully completed projects for Orlando-area theme parks and the University of Central Florida.

Matthew is an expert in haptic gloves and the ability to feel the virtual world. Taking hardware solutions and programming this equipment so humans can experience something that can be dangerous but in a safe environment. Another example includes rocket launchers that allow regular people to blow something up in a virtual environment.  He believes if people don’t work to understand these new technologies they will be left behind. 

Tune in to hear more about the DoomsDay Clock that is set to 90 seconds to midnight. As humans, we live in an unprecedented level of danger.
